    1. execute(GameContext)

Interface ICommand

All Known Implementing Classes:
DropCommand, EscapeCommand, HelpCommand, LookAroundCommand, MoveCommand, OpenChestCommand, PickUpCommand, QuitCommand, ShowInventoryCommand, ShowMapCommand, ShowStatsCommand, UnknownCommand, UseCommand, WakeUpCommand
public interface ICommand
The ICommand interface defines the structure for all command classes in the game. Each command that implements this interface must define the behavior of the execute method, which allows the command to be performed based on the game's current context.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    execute(GameContext context)
    Executes the command using the provided GameContext.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      void execute(GameContext context)
      Executes the command using the provided GameContext. Each command implementation determines the specific action it performs when executed.
      Parameters:
      context - the current game context which contains all necessary information about the player, dungeon, and game state
